channel.title: Fun Facts on DwarfPets in English
channel.description: Recent content in Fun Facts on DwarfPets in English

item.title: Why Do Parakeets Stand On One Foot?
item.description: Parakeets are a bird that come to us from Australia. These birds can make great pets to keep in your home and really like it when they can interact with others around them.

item.title: Why Is My Parakeet Clicking Its Beak?
item.description: A parakeet is able to make a lot of different sounds. While they canâ€™t use words to talk with us, these sounds allow them to communicate in ways that many owners can understand once they keep the pet around for a little bit.
